Eliane Lucia Bodanese

  • Endereço para acessar este CV: http://lattes.cnpq.br/8960424357508801
  • Última atualização do currículo em 16/08/2002

Possui graduação em Engenharia Eletrônica pela Universidade Federal do Paraná(1988), mestrado em Engenharia Elétrica pela Universidade Federal de Santa Catarina(1992) e doutorado em Telecomunicações pela Queen Mary And Westfield College University Of London(2000). Atualmente é professor titular do Centro Federal de Educação Tecnológica do Paraná. Atuando principalmente nos seguintes temas:Telecommunicações, Redes Celulares Móveis, Ciência da Computação, Sistemas Distribuídos, Agentes Inteligentes. (Texto gerado automaticamente pela aplicação CVLattes)

Título: A Distributed Channel Allocation Scheme for Cellular Networks using Intelligent Software Agents, Ano de obtenção: 2000.

Produção bibliográfica
Artigos completos publicados em periódicos

1.
CUTHBERT, L. G.2001 CUTHBERT, L. G. ; RYAN, D. ; TOKARCHUK, L. ; BIGHAM, J. ; BODANESE, E. L. . Using Intelligent Agents to Manage Resources in 3G Networks. The Journal Of The Institution Of British Telecommunications Engineers, London, v. 2, n.4, p. 39-44, 2001.

Trabalhos completos publicados em anais de congressos
1.
CUTHBERT, L. G. ; RYAN, D. ; TOKARCHUK, L. ; BIGHAM, J. ; BODANESE, E. L. . Using Intelligent Agents to Manage Resources in 3G Networks. In: IASTED International Conference on Wireless and Optical Communications, 2001, Banf. Proceedings of the IASTED International Conference on Wireless and Optical Communications, 2001. p. 1-6.

2.
BODANESE, E. L.; CUTHBERT, L. G. . Applying Intelligent Software Agents in Frequency Channel Allocation. In: IASTED International Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Applications, 2001, Marbella. Proceedings of the IASTED International Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Applications. Anaheim: ACTA Press, 2001. p. 360-365.

3.
BODANESE, E. L.; CUTHBERT, L. G. . An Intelligent Channel Allocation Scheme for Mobile Networks: An Application of Agent Technology. In: The 2001 International Conference on Intelligent Agent Technology, 2001, Maebashi. Intelligent Agent Technology Research and Development. Singapore: World Scientific, 2001. p. 322-333.

4.
BODANESE, E. L.; CUTHBERT, L. G. . A Multi-Agent Scheme for Resource Allocation in Mobile Networks. In: ITC Specialist Seminar on Mobile Systems and Mobility, 2000, Lillehammer. Proceedings of the ITC Specialist Seminar on Mobile Systems and Mobility, 2000. v. 1. p. 349-360.

5.
BODANESE, E. L.; CUTHBERT, L. G. . Intelligent Agents for Resource Allocation in Mobile networks. In: XVII World Telecommunications Congress, 2000, Birmingham. CD version, 2000. p. 1-6.

6.
BODANESE, E. L.; CUTHBERT, L. G. . Application of Intelligent Agents in Channel Allocation Strategies in Mobile Networks. In: 2000 IEEE International Conference on Communications (ICC 2000), 2000, New Orleans. Proceedings of the 2000 IEEE International Conference on Communications (ICC 2000), 2000. p. 1-5.

7.
BODANESE, E. L.; CUTHBERT, L. G. . A Multi-Agent Channel Allocation Scheme for Cellular Mobile Networks. In: 4th International Conference on MultiAgent Systems (ICMAS 2000), 2000, Boston. Proceeding of the 4th International Conference on MultiAgent Systems (ICMAS 2000). Los Alamitos: IEEE Computer Society, 2000. v. 1. p. 63-70.

8.
BODANESE, E. L.; CUTHBERT, L. G. . A Multi-Agent Scheme for Channel Allocation in Mobile Networks. In: World Multiconference on Systemics, Cybernetics and Informatics (SCI 2000), 2000, Orlando, 2000. v. 2. p. 236-243.

9.
BODANESE, E. L.; CUTHBERT, L. G. . Distributed Channel Allocation Scheme for Cellular Networks using Intelligent Agents. In: 7th International Conference in Telecommunication Systems, 1999, Nashville. Proceedings of the 7th International Conference in Telecommunication Systems, 1999. v. 1. p. 156-165.

10.
BODANESE, E. L.; CUTHBERT, L. G. . A Multi-Agent Approach for Channel Allocation in Cellular Networks. In: IMPACT99 - Communications Networks and the Impact of Software Agents, 1999, Seattle. Proceedings of the IMPACT99 - Communications Networks and the Impact of Software Agents, 1999. v. 1. p. 64-73.

11.
BODANESE, E. L.; FRAGA, J. S. . Um suporte para programação distribuída em múltiplas linguagens (SPML). In: XIII SEMISH - Seminário Integrado de Software e Hardware do XIII Congresso da Sociedade Brasileira da Computação, 1993, Florianópolis. Anais do XIII SEMISH - Seminário Integrado de Software e Hardware do XIII Congresso da Sociedade Brasileira da Computação, 1993. v. 1. p. 628-642.
